Vampire Hunter 2: Darkstalkers Revenge

Achievements.Title: Welcome to my domains
Achievements.Description: Activate the Dark Force. (P1, Options: Default)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Jon Talbain
Achievements.Description: Finish the whole game as Gallon. (P1, Options: Default)

Achievements.Description: Finish the whole game as Victor. (P1, Options: Default)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: There is no dishonor in falling before me
Achievements.Description: O. Bishamon: Hit your opponent with Oni Kubi Hineri →↓←+2P, Enma Ishi ←↓→+2K, Togakubi Sarashi (opponent lying down) ↓↓+2P and Kimen Kudaki ←↓←+2P. (P1 vs COM)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Return to the void!
Achievements.Description: Donovan: Hit your opponent with Press of Death ←↓→+K, Change Immortal MP,LP,←,LK,MK and cast Slay Shred ←↓←+2K. (P1 vs COM)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: I'll take away your body and your soul
Achievements.Description: Morrigan: Hit your opponent with Darkness Illusion LP,LP,→,LK,HP, Valkyrie Turn →↓←+K then P or K, Finishing Shower MP,LP,←,LK,MK, Cryptic Needle →,HP,MP,LP,→ and cast Astral Vision LP,LP,→,MP,HP. (P1 vs COM)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: I need a more challenging foe
Achievements.Description: Pyron: Hit your opponent with Piled Hell →↓→+2K and cast Shining Gemini →↓→↓→+2P, Cosmo Disruption ←↓→+2P/2K. (P1 vs COM)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Target destroyed, mission completed!
Achievements.Description: Phobos: Hit your opponent with Erasing Sphere →↓→+2K and cast Final Guardian β ←↓←↓+2K, Ray of Doom ↓→↘+2P. (P1 vs COM)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Return to the darkness shade!
Achievements.Description: Lei-Lei: Hit your opponent with Tenrai Ha LK,HK,MP,MP,↑, (near) Chireitou ←↓→+2K and cast Chuukadan ←↓→+2P. (P1 vs COM)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: I don't like to fight weaklings like you
Achievements.Description: Sasquatch: Hit your opponent with Big Freeze ←↓→+2P, Big Ice Burn ←↓→+2K,  Big Sledge (close)→↓←↑→↓←↑+2K and cast Big Trap ←↓→+Start, Big Resistor with MAPS ←↓←+2K. (P1 vs COM)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: You land beings are so weak!
Achievements.Description: Aulbath: Hit your opponent with Aqua Spread →↓+2P/2K, Sea Rage ←↓→+2P, Direct Scissors ↓↓+2P and cast Water Jail →↓→+2P. (P1 vs COM)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: I will cut you up!
Achievements.Description: Bishamon: Hit your opponent with Oni Kubi Hineri →↓←+2P, Enma Ishi ←↓→+2K and Togakubi Sarashi (opponent lying down) ↓↓+2P. (P1 vs COM)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: I hate you! Nyah Nyah
Achievements.Description: Felicia: Hit your opponent with Dancing Flash ←↓→+2P , Please Help Me! ←↓→+2K and cast Kitty's Helper ←↓←+2K. (P1 vs COM)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: My power is as eternal as the desert sands
Achievements.Description: Anakaris: Hit your opponent with S. no Oshie →↓→+2P, N. no Ana ←↓→+2K, H. no Mai ↓↓+2P/2K, P.Split LP,LP,↓,MK,HK, P.Magic MK,LP,↓,LK,MP, P.Salvation HK,MP,↓,MK,HP and P.Decoration HK,MP,LK,↓,LP,MK,HP. (P1 vs COM)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Shut up! You're supposed to be dead!
Achievements.Description: Zabel: Hit your opponent with Evil Scream →←+2P, Death Voltage (air)→↓←+2K, Hell Dunk →↓→+2P, Ultimate Undead ←↓←+2K and Ultimate Revenge (blocking)→↓→+2K. (P1 vs COM)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: The professor made me strong
Achievements.Description: Victor: Hit your opponent with Great Geldenheim ←↓→+2K then P, Thunder Break (hold ↓)↑+2K and Geldenheim 3 (close)→↓←↑→↓←↑+2K. (P1 vs COM)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: My power is the fury of the beast
Achievements.Description: Gallon: Hit your opponent with Dragon Cannon ←↓→+2P, Moment Slice LP,MP,→,LK,MK and cast Mirage Body ←↓→+2K. (P1 vs COM)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Tonight, I will drink your blood
Achievements.Description: Demitri: Hit your opponent with Midnight Bliss ↓→↓→+2P, Demon Blast ↓→↓→+2K, Midnight Pleasure LP,MP,→,MK,MK and cast Darkside Master ←↓←+2K. (P1 vs COM)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Your soul is mine!
Achievements.Description: Activate the Soul Mode and beat the game without returning to the character select screen after your first win. (P1, Options: Default)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Master of Puppets
Achievements.Description: Activate the Marionette Mode and beat the game without returning to the character select screen after your first win. (P1, Options: Default)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Here comes a new challenger!
Achievements.Description: Perform 3 Ex Finish without losing a round, and defeat the challenger. (P1, Options: Default)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Realize the meaning of your defeat
Achievements.Description: Finish the game on the difficulty 8. (P1, Other Options: Default)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: You will never defeat me
Achievements.Description: Finish the game without using continues. (P1, Options: Default)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: You were a worthy foe
Achievements.Description: Defeat the secret boss Oboro Bishamon in any difficulty. (P1, Other Options: Default)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos
